name: Myrmex, Young
movement: walk 30 ft., burrow 15 ft., climb 30 ft.
description: The Myrmex is a small elemental creature that embodies neutrality with a natural armor and keen sensory skills. It is known for its ability to manipulate earth and navigate various terrains effortlessly.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate terrain permanently and create sculptures or stories from the earth makes the Myrmex a unique presence in the natural world.
goals: To exist harmoniously within its environment and assist others or defend its territory as necessary.
relations: Related to other elemental creatures and can be encountered with earth or stone-based entities.
environment: Typically found in natural settings with access to earth or stone.
strengths: Possesses resistance to poison and immunity to exhaustion, paralysis, and petrification, enhanced navigation capabilities.
weaknesses: Limited offensive power, primarily reliant on manipulative abilities rather than direct combat.
attacks: Bite attack deals piercing and poison damage, and the Earth Shift ability can push targets and hinder their movement.
most_powerful_ability: Earth Manipulation, allowing it to reshape terrain and create permanent alterations in its environment.
senses: The Myrmex has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without the need for light.
skills: It has neutral passive perception, indicating an average awareness of its environment.
additional_information: Elemental nature allows it to survive without air, food, drink, or sleep.
Keen Smell grants advantage on perception checks based on smell.
Can magically transmit simple messages and images to creatures nearby.
Spider Climb ability lets it traverse difficult surfaces without checks.
Stone Walk enables movement through earth or stone terrain without extra cost.
